page.title: 04THE ACLE BY PASS
page.content: DECIDED UPON-MUCH TO THE ANNOYANCE OF THE MAJORITY OF VILLAGERS.LOCAL PEOPLE ,WHILE OBVIOUSLY SUPPORTING THE GENERAL CONCEPT OF A RELIEF ROAD,HAVE VOICED STRONG OPPOSITION TO THE SECOND OPTION CHIEFLY BECAUSE THEY FEEL IT IS NOT SO MUCH A BY_PASS AS A THROUGH_WAY DIVIDING,AS IT DOES,THE COMMUNITES OF ACLE AND DAMGATE.THEY POINT OUT THAT THE PROPOSED ROAD AND ITS LINKS WOULD NECESSITATE A LONGER CAR JOURNEY FOR MOTHERS FROM DAMGATE WHO DROP THEIR CHILDREN OFF AT THE PRIMARY SCHOOL AND THAT DAMGATE WILL INEVITABLY SUFFER A SIGNIFICANT CHANGE IN CHARACTER.THEY BELIEVE THAT THE ALTERNATIVE NORTHERN ROUTE WOULD AFFECT FAR FEWER PEOPLE, AND FEEL THAT IT IS ONLY THE INFLUENTIAL "FARMING LOBBY" WHOSE OPINION HAS BEEN CONSIDERED IN THE MATTER.MORE REALISTICALLY,IN THIS TIME OF FINANICIAL STRINGENCY,IT IS MORE
